observation: Peary | Put Your Lazy Money To Work.  Get in touch Unlocking accessible and inclusive Why reinvent the wheel? Leverage the skills and live actions of Peary’s world-class contributors, saving you time & money. Start For Free Today's dilemma is that our time is becoming increasingly limited while the need for additional income is growing. We help you unlock your next income stream while saving time and energy. Start Earning Tap into the skills of Peary’s contributors that will allow you to make professional moves towards becoming financially stronger, regardless of your background. Our Trusted Partners Copy Trading Work smarter with our Done For You Copy Trading Trajectory. Follow every trade made by our in-house traders and watch your trading portfolio grow with 10% - 20% per month passively. Portfolio Set-up In this module we will guide you through the steps to set-up your trading portfolio on a third party trading platform. Because after all, you and only you should have access to your portfolio. Connect to Peary Copy Trading In this module we will guide you through the steps to connect your trading account to Peary Copy Trading and put your money to work for you, passively. Portfolio Performance Tracking In this module we will guide you through the steps to track the performance of your trading portfolio with just 15 minutes of work per month. Digital Product Trading Resell digital products from today's most credible companies and earn additional income using the ancient principle of supply and demand. Your Digital Wallet Marketplace In this module we will guide you through the steps to connect you wallet to the largest Digital Utility marketplace and how to navigate through it. Trading Checklist In this module we will provide you with a checklist that teaches you how to research, buy and sell the hottest Digital Utility projects of today. This list is your secret weapon to unlock the skill ... Weekly AMA Sessions Join our live Ask Me Anything sessions every Thursday at 4 p.m. to exchange thoughts and ask questions directly to Peary’s contributors and fellow community members. Join Peary Community + Support Exchange thoughts, network and reach new levels together with your Peary Community and 7-day-a-week chat support from Peary’s contributors. Meet the team We’ve assembled an all-star team of contributors and trading professionals to help you achieve your goals. Raúl Galindo Del Campo Founder and Captain Dave Getrouw Head contributor, CSM Jim Button Peary in-house trader Miguel Valencia Community manager, Customer support Our Pricing Unlock your next income stream today By joining Peary you unlock monthly access to all programs, community and coaching. 21 Days Free Then €49,99 per month Testimonials Fully passive, you don't need to do anything, your money is safe (never leaves your account) - you just need to trust the trader (Jim) is making the right trades. He trades for himself, so he bears the same risks as you. So the personal incentive to trade profitably is really big. Can Community member My experience with Peary has been welcoming and very positive. I've been a member of the community for a little over a month now and I actually don't see myself leaving. I am in for the long haul. The reason for this is having the opportunity to talk to well trained professionals in Copy Trading and NFT trading. I also have the community to talk to and others like myself looking for ways to make a little extra on the side. Keep in mind that financial freedom or "getting rich" doesn't happen over night. But this is a great forum to start your journey. If they do well, you do well, and vice versa. I am thankful for Raul, Dave and Jim and the rest of the team for being transparent and honest about details and intentions. 5 stars! Torbjorn Sebastian Peary copy trading is a very nice platform where you can follow what Jim is doing in real time. You can see which trades are open and which have already been closed. You can also see what result has been achieved per trade. Jim also provides feedback on why he has made certain choices and keeps you informed. Your money is on a separate platform where only you have access to your money. Jim and Peary can't reach that. Grow your money passively, just because you can! Maaike Friendly coaches. Quick responsing. Knowledgeable. Great vision.Recommend. Jacob Amazing and consistent! My experience with Peary’s copy trading is amazing. I can see how diligent Jim enters every trade and how he detailed he is when he explains why he did some entries. We can just put in our capital and keep track on the growth of our account. Melvin I give 5 stars because I like the community and I met like amazing people.Professionals in NFTs are always there to help and they are serious about what they are doing. Khalil Sebastian Frequently Asked Questions How does Peary’s free trial work? The first three weeks are free for Peary's products. After your free trial, you will automatically be charged €49,99 per month if you do not cancel your subscription. Is Peary available internationally? What does Peary trade exactly? We currently trade cryptocurrencies and non fungible tokens (NFTs) Made accessible to you, by Peary. +31 6 42264250 gm@peary.io Still have questions? Join Raúl next Monday in a live workshop and find out if Peary is right for you. Sign up Join Community Group 2023 © All rights reserved by Peary company
